item.description:
Everything's finalized. I'll be at the Visitor's Center at 11 am. Here's a map and info page: http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/central/purg.htm

The rangers said dogs are permitted as long as you leash and pick up after them.

Make sure to bring some bug repellent in case of ticks, and have a rain-repellent jacket, as there's a "slight chance" of a shower or two.

If anybody would like to go somewhere for eats afterward, I'm open to that.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Purgatory Chasm, Anybody?
